price: 44. Tenez-lui des propos conciliants, peut-être qu’il se rappellera et (Me) craindra. »
arabic: فَقُولَا لَهُۥ قَوۡلٗا لَّيِّنٗا لَّعَلَّهُۥ يَتَذَكَّرُ أَوۡ يَخۡشَىٰ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: faqūlā lahu qawlan layyinan laʿallahu yatadhakkaru aw yakhshā
